1.title: Pal Pal dil ke paas
1.plot: Three months have passed since Karan and Tipsy last saw each other. Tipsy is busy fulfilling her to-do list in Europe. But is she happy? Before she can figure this out, Sherry calls her back to Mumbai urgently. Tipsy is shocked to see Karan at a local court. Will she ignore him or talk to him?

2.title: Ae dil hai Mushkil
2.plot: Karan Khanna tries to understand and get close to Tipsy. But he fears what will happen when Tipsy learns that Radhika is living with him. To Karan's delight, Tipsy unites with him to solve Sherry and Vishal's problems. However, Karan is less than delighted to see Tipsy meet her 'date' at a café.

3.title: Pehla Nasha
3.plot: Chetti and Amma arrive at the airport and Karan hopes to impress them. But its not easy to impress Chitti. While shopping, Trisha is accused of shoplifting and an unlikely messiah comes to her rescue. Radhika's legal battle for Prabuddha's property is set to get more complicated.

4.title: Kambakht Ishq
4.plot: Romila is back. And so is more drama in Karan's life. Will this create more distance between Karan and Tipsy or bring them closer? Meanwhile, Palash discusses his past with Karan even as he risks crossing paths with it. In her next meeting with Palash, Radhika brings Karan along with her. Will Karan and Palash continue to remain friends?

5.title: Pyar tune kya kiya
5.plot: Radhika and Karan's meeting with Palash doesn't go well. Karan accuses him of being cold-hearted. In his attempt to impress Chitti, Vishal gets trashed, literally. Complicating matters further, Chitti considers who among Vishal and Addu is a suitable match for Tipsy. Even though Radhika decides to move out of Karan's house, the distance between Tipsy and Karan increases.

6.title: Dil hai ki maanta nahin.
6.plot: This is the season of confrontations for Tipsy and Karan. Tipsy wants to know what does Radhika mean to Karan? An upset Tipsy meets Addu and Karan walks in. He gets more upset in return. When Tipsy visits Karan's home to placate him, she is not ready for what she sees.

7.title: Baaton baaton mein
7.plot: In a hilarious turn of events, a newly married Sherry meets another prospective groom. Vishal is having a hard time handling the situation. Tipsy's apartment turns into a headquarter of chaos. At Trisha's birthday party, the photo booth captures not just pictures but some major drama. Rohan learns something that Trisha has been over-looking all these days.

8.title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
8.plot: Tipsy and Karan get an opportunity to spend some time alone as Amma and Chitti are not at home. But will they make this moment special? Karan rushes to help Radhika get her boutique back. But Palash refuses every amicable proposal. Tipsy's new patient is admitted in a serious condition.

9.title: Jiya laage na tum bin
9.plot: Palash battles for his life and Tipsy tries her best to save him. She fears getting dragged into his complicated life. She contemplates telling Karan all about her past. Will he understand? Palash pulls an elaborate plan to get close to Tipsy.

10.title: Picture abhi baaki hai meri dost
10.plot: Tipsy experiences shock and delight simultaneously at the inauguration event of Veda Rehab Clinic as Palash and Karan both present themselves. The event proves to be a moment of bitter realization for both the men. Tipsy is left hurt and upset. An adamant Palash offers a deal that leaves Karan fuming. What is the future of Karan and Tipsy?

11.title: Picture abhi baaki hai
11.plot: Karan wants to help Tipsy but is unable to and on the other hand Tipsy wants to talk about Palash but can't get herself to do it. She fears that their respective past is preventing their future from taking any shape. To make matters worse, Palash plots to keep the two apart. Meanwhile, Radhika doesn't answer calls from her anyone.

12.title: Do Dil Mil Rahe Hain
12.plot: Everyone is excited as there is a wedding. But not Tipsy, who is anxious about Karan. On the other hand, Karan feels hopeful about the possibility of a future with Tipsy. Meanwhile, Palash hasn't forgotten his old love yet.

13.title: Aa Gale Lag Ja
13.plot: Amidst the wedding celebrations, Karan is nursing his broken heart. He decides to leave, but not before making Chitti realise her mistake. When Sherry confronts Tipsy about her shocking decision, she shows no signs of changing her mind. But there is something that Tipsy wants Karan to know. Will Tipsy manage to talk to Karan before he leaves?

14.title: Kya Yahi Pyaar Hain
14.plot: In a surprising turn of events, several hearts unite. Tipsy and Karan have made many sacrifices but finally declare their love for each other. Is this the beginning of a beautiful journey for Karan and Tipsy? Meanwhile, Trisha has other plans for her parents, Karan and Radhika.

1.title: DO AKELE SHEHAR MEIN
1.plot: An arrogant, fading superstar, and a humble, caring doctor - does destiny have its own plans for them?

2.title: KABHI HAAN KABHI NAA
2.plot: Karan's last effort to revive his career lands him in front of an unintimidated Tripura. Will they get along?

3.title: HUMSAFAR
3.plot: Tripura is at her professional best. But she's not prepared for Karan's plans for her. Will they find some common ground?

4.title: PATI PATNI AUR WOH
4.plot: A questionable character, a failed marriage, and an estranged daughter. The arrogant actor has his own reasons to frown while Tripura struggles with a case of mistaken identity.

5.title: Khel Khel Mein
5.plot: Trisha's bitterness hurts Karan. A meltdown takes him to his extremes. Will Tripura be able to pull him back from the edge?

6.title: BAIRI PIYA
6.plot: Tripura foils Karan's escape plan. How long will the alcoholic avoid his therapist?

7.title: BANDINI
7.plot: Karan comes to Tripura's rescue. But there is a hidden price to it. Will Tripura be able to handle it?

8.title: Aur Pyaar Ho Gaya
8.plot: A confrontation, followed by a fallout, followed by a surprise visit from a very important person. Karan and Tripura both begin to discover new sides of each other's personalities.

9.title: UFF YEH MOHABBAT
9.plot: As Karan tries to set things right with Tipsy, things take a strange turn as she misinterprets his honest intentions.

10.title: PYAR KE SIDE EFFECTS
10.plot: Karan's closeness to Tripura's family leaves her awestruck. Will she go with the flow or will Karan hit a dead end?

11.title: EK LADKI KO DEKHA
11.plot: Karan's feelings for Tripura lend a new meaning to his life. Is this the beginning of a love story or is Karan headed for another disappointment?

12.title: KISSA ANGOOTHI KA
12.plot: Karan vows to unite with the love of his life. Will Tripura be able to understand her own feelings towards Karan?

13.title: Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge
13.plot: Two men in love with the same woman. Who will win her heart? Will Karan give up so easily?

14.title: KUCH NA KAHO
14.plot: Tripura defends Karan in front of his family. Will this mark the beginning of their love story?

15.title: Hum Tum
15.plot: Karan is faced with a sudden choice between love and unforeseen responsibilities. Will this be the end of Karan and Tipsy's newfound understanding?

imdb.plot outline: Karan Khanna is a recovering alcoholic who, along with his counsellor Tripurasundari Nagrajan, takes a detoxification trip to Mahabaleshwar. The story takes a turn when he attends his estranged daughter's wedding with Tripurasundari Nagrajan and discovers why opposites truly attract. Will their romance blossom? Or will it be just another page in their contrasting lives?
imdb.title: Karrle Tu Bhi Mohabbat
plot: An alcoholic reluctant to recover, a head strong counsellor who won't quit, and a life changing trip to the hills.

Karan Khanna is a recovering alcoholic who, along with his counsellor Tripurasundari Nagrajan, takes a detoxification trip to Mahabaleshwar. The story takes a turn when he attends his estranged daughter's wedding with Tripurasundari Nagrajan and discovers why opposites truly attract. Will their romance blossom? Or will it be just another page in their contrasting lives?
